      • cellFromByteBuffer

        public CellName cellFromByteBuffer(java.nio.ByteBuffer bytes)
        Description copied from interface: CellNameType
        Deserialize a Composite from a ByteBuffer. This is equilvalent to CType#fromByteBuffer but assumes the buffer is a full cell name. This is meant for thrift/cql2 to convert the fully serialized buffer we get from the clients.
        Specified by:
        cellFromByteBuffer in interface CellNameType

      • create

        public CellName create(Composite prefix,
              ColumnDefinition column,
              java.nio.ByteBuffer collectionElement)
        Description copied from interface: CellNameType
        Creates a new collection CellName given a clustering prefix, a CQL3 column and the collection element.
        Specified by:
        create in interface CellNameType

      • rowMarker

        public CellName rowMarker(Composite prefix)
        Description copied from interface: CellNameType
        Creates a row marker for the CQL3 having the provided clustering prefix. Note that this is only valid for CQL3 tables (isCompound() and !isDense()) and should only be called for them.
        Specified by:
        rowMarker in interface CellNameType

      • staticPrefix

        public Composite staticPrefix()
        Description copied from interface: CellNameType
        The prefix to use for static columns. Note that create() methods below for creating CellName automatically handle static columns already for convenience, and so there is not need to pass this prefix for them. There is few other cases where we need the prefix directly however.
        Specified by:
        staticPrefix in interface CellNameType

        public boolean hasCollections()
        Description copied from interface: CellNameType

      • make

        public Composite make(java.lang.Object... components)
        Description copied from interface: CType
        Convenience method to build composites from their component. The arguments can be either ByteBuffer or actual objects of the type corresponding to their position.
        Specified by:

        Overrides:
        make in class AbstractCType

      • makeCellName

        public CellName makeCellName(java.lang.Object... components)
        Description copied from interface: CellNameType
        Convenience method to create cell names given its components. This is equivalent to CType#make() but return a full cell name (and thus require all the components of the name).
        Specified by:
        makeCellName in interface CellNameType
